data.author: Helen Keller
data.message: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much

data.author: Henry Ford
data.message: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself

data.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes
data.message: Many ideas grow better when transplanted into another mind than the one where they sprang up

data.author: Isaac Newton
data.message: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants

data.author: H.E. Luccock
data.message: No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it

data.author: Andrew Carnegie
data.message: Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results

data.author: Charles Darwin
data.message: It is the long history of humankind (and animal kind, too) that those who learned to collaborate and improvise most effectively have prevailed

data.author: Henry Ford
data.message: Coming together is a beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success

data.author: Michael Jordan
data.message: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships

data.author: Phil Jackson
data.message: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships

data.author: James Cash Penney
data.message: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison

data.author: Amy Poehler
data.message: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you, spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life

data.author: Simon Mainwaring
data.message: Effectively, change is almost impossible without industry-wide collaboration, cooperation, and consensus

data.author: Patrick Lencioni
data.message: Teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability

data.author: Jim Stovall
data.message: You need to be aware of what others are doing, applaud their efforts, acknowledge their successes, and encourage them in their pursuits. When we all help one another, everybody wins

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.message: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don’t play together, the club won’t be worth a dime

data.author: George Shinn
data.message: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others

data.author: Napolean Hill
data.message: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed

data.author: Kurt Koffka
data.message: The whole is other than the sum of the parts

data.author: Norman Shidle
data.message: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of others

data.author: Lewis B. Ergen
data.message: The ratio of We’s to I’s is the best indicator of the development of a team

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.message: Individual commitment to a group effort -- that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work

data.author: Jin Kwon
data.message: One piece of log creates a small fire, adequate to warm you up, add just a few more pieces to blast an immense bonfire, large enough to warm up your entire circle of friends; needless to say that individuality counts but teamwork dynamites

data.author: Reid Hoffman
data.message: No matter how brilliant your mind or strategy, if you’re playing a solo game, you’ll always lose out to a team

data.author: Mark Twain
data.message: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great

data.author: Booker T. Washington
data.message: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.message: Great things in business are never done by one person; they're done by a team of people

data.author: Ryunosuke Satoro
data.message: Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean

data.author: Virginia Burden
data.message: Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there

data.author: Mother Teresa
data.message: None of us, including me, ever do great things. But we can all do small things, with great love, and together we can do something wonderful

data.author: Harry Truman
data.message: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit

data.author: Louisa May Alcott
data.message: It takes two flints to make a fire

data.author: Iyanla Vanzant
data.message: The way to achieve your own success is to be willing to help somebody else get it first

data.author: African Proverb
data.message: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together

data.author: Howard Schultz
data.message: Success is best when it's shared
